goal.en: This course studies the governing equations of climate dynamics the associated physical mechanisms. A particular focus is put on the roles played by compressibility, density stratification, rotation, advection, baroclinic effect, and convection-radiation interaction etc. It is an important course for advanced climate science research field.
goal.ch: 本課程探討氣候動力學之控制方程和物理機制，內容強調可壓縮性、密度分層、旋轉效應、球面曲率效應、平流、斜壓效應、對流輻射交互作用等所扮演的角色，是進入氣候科學研究領域重要之課程。
